alert.note: Alert for Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 5:07PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...High based showers and very isolated thunderstorms will impact portions of Otero, southwestern Kiowa, Crowley and eastern Pueblo Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 505 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking the remnants of a weakening high based shower 10 miles northeast of Boone, or 27 miles east of Pueblo, moving northeast at 40 mph.Other showers were developing across portions of Otero and southeast Pueblo county. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. Brief localized gusts to near 60 mph will be possible near or under high based showers and thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... La Junta, North La Junta, Rocky Ford, Fowler, Ordway, Swink, Manzanola, Olney Springs, Boone, Sugar City, Cheraw, Crowley and Timpas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Western Kiowa County
